word: Truth itself will create resistance in many hearts; but we should have long patience with those who do not see as we do. "Love worketh no ill to his neighbor, therefore love is the fulfilling of the law. And that, knowing the time, that now it is high time to awake out of sleep: for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed. The night is far spent, the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness: and let us put on the armor of light" [Romans 13:10-12].
